{{Infobox/Jutsu |ref=''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 238 |image=Bullet Technique.png |kanji=水遁・鉄砲玉 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Suiton: Teppōdama |literal english=Water Release: Gunshot |english tv=Water Style: Liquid Bullets |game names=Liquid Bullets[[Naruto Collectible Card Game]]
Water Style: Iron Jade[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Online]] |jutsu rank=C |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu |jutsu type=Water Release |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short, Mid, Long |users=Gamabunta, Umibōzu~anime, Gamakichi~game, Suigetsu Hōzuki~game, Tobirama Senju~game |hand signs=Tiger |debut manga=135 |boruto=No |debut anime=78 |debut shippuden=No |boruto anime=No |game debut=Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3 |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Game }} The user creates [[water]] in their body using [[chakra]]. The user then spits the water from their mouth as orb-shaped projectiles, whose destructive potential are determined by how much chakra is placed in them. The orbs travel quickly towards the target, dealing extensive damage upon impact. When [[Gamabunta]] uses this technique, the water orbs are not only especially large, but are made more lethal because they're shot while he's airborne, thereby adding the force of gravity to their power. == See Also == * [[Starch Syrup Gun]] == References == [[es:Elemento Agua: Disparo de Agua]] [[fr:Suiton - Bombe Aqueuse]] [[pl:Suiton: Teppōdama]]
